overview: Facing an arranged marriage to a man of dubious morals, heiress Korah Hurley poses as the impoverished travelling companion of her aunt, the Marquise de Jaurmais, in order to test whether her rakish fianc√©'s affections are truly for her or for the fortune she will inherit.
tagline: A Story of the Ways and Wiles of Women by the Famous Author Who Discovered 'It'
title: Knowing Men
